Ingredients.1: 0.5 pounds sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped

Ingredients.5: 1 (340 gram) package Yves Veggie Cuisine® Original Veggie Ground Round

Ingredients.9: 1 cup Imagine® Low Sodium Organic Vegetable Broth

Ingredients.10: 1 cup combined, Yves Veggie Cuisine® sweet peas, Yves Veggie Cuisine® whole kernel Golden Corn and carrots

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: In pot of boiling water, cook potatoes for about 15 minutes or until tender.

Directions.3: Drain well and return to pot. Add margarine and half of the fresh ground pepper and mash until smooth; set aside.

Directions.4: In a non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Cook ground round, green pepper and garlic, stirring for 5 minutes.

Directions.5: Stir in flour and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.

Directions.6: Add stock to skillet; bring to a boil.

Directions.7: Add peas, corn, carrots, and remaining ground pepper.

Directions.8: Spread mixture into 8-inch (2 L) square baking dish. Spread mashed potato over top.

Directions.9: Bake in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes or until bubbly around edges.
